name: R5-EvidenceVariable-R4B-EvidenceVariable
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 EvidenceVariable into FHIR R4B

element.display: A definition of an exposure, outcome, or other variable

target.display: A definition of an exposure, outcome, or other variable
target.comment: R5 `EvidenceVariable` maps as Equivalent to R4B `EvidenceVariable`

element.display: Actual or conceptual

target.comment: R5 `EvidenceVariable.actual` maps as Equivalent to R4B `EvidenceVariable.actual`

element.display: When the resource was approved by publisher
Who authored the content

target.comment: R5 `EvidenceVariable.author` maps as Equivalent to R4B `EvidenceVariable.author`

element.display: A grouping for ordinal or polychotomous variables

target.display: A grouping for ordinal or polychotomous variables
target.comment: R5 `EvidenceVariable.category` maps as Equivalent to R4B `EvidenceVariable.category`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.comment: R5 `EvidenceVariable.category.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `EvidenceVariable.category.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `extension`

element.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing

target.comment: R5 `EvidenceVariable.category.id` maps as Equivalent to R4B `EvidenceVariable.category.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `EvidenceVariable.category.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `EvidenceVariable.category.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `modifierExtension`

element.display: Description of the grouping

target.comment: R5 `EvidenceVariable.category.name` maps as Equivalent to R4B `EvidenceVariable.category.name`

element.display: Definition of the grouping

target.comment: R5 `EvidenceVariable.category.value[x]` maps as Equivalent to R4B `EvidenceVariable.category.value[x]`

element.display: A defining factor of the EvidenceVariable

target.display: What defines the members of the evidence element
target.comment: R5 `EvidenceVariable.characteristic` maps as Equivalent to R4B `EvidenceVariable.characteristic`

element.display: Used to specify how two or more characteristics are combined
A defining factor of the characteristic
all-of | any-of | at-least | at-most | statistical | net-effect | dataset
Additional content defined by implementations
Unique id for inter-element referencing
Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
Provides the value of "n" when "at-least" or "at-most" codes are used
Defines the characteristic using type and value
Device used for determining characteristic
Additional content defined by implementations
Unique id for inter-element referencing
Method for how the characteristic value was determined
Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
Reference point for valueQuantity or valueRange
Expresses the type of characteristic
Defines the characteristic when coupled with characteristic.type
Defines the characteristic (without using type and value) by a Canonical
Defines the characteristic (without using type and value) by a CodeableConcept
Defines the characteristic (without using type and value) by an expression
Defines the characteristic (without using type and value) by an id
Defines the characteristic (without using type and value) by a Reference
Natural language description of the characteristic

target.display: Natural language description of the characteristic
target.comment: R5 `EvidenceVariable.characteristic.description` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `EvidenceVariable.characteristic.description` - description has change due to type change: R5 description markdown has no equivalent or mapped type in R4B description

element.display: Length of time in which the characteristic is met
Whether the characteristic is an inclusion criterion or exclusion criterion

Label for internal linking

Used to express the observation within a period before and/or after the event
